title: GLB Inspector
description: Drop your GLB 3D asset anywhere here or click below to start exploring. Let's see what's inside your model!

desktopOnly.title: Desktop Only Feature
desktopOnly.description: The GLB Inspector is currently optimized for desktop use. Please visit this page on a computer for the best experience.

intro.title: GLB Inspector
intro.description: A powerful tool for inspecting and analyzing GLB 3D asset files. View metadata, explore textures, and more.

modelInfo.title: Model Information
modelInfo.description: View comprehensive metadata, including author details and licensing.

expressionControl.title: Expression Control
expressionControl.description: Test and preview facial expressions and blendshapes.

textureAnalysis.title: Texture Analysis
textureAnalysis.description: Examine and download model textures with format details.

comingSoon.title: Mobile Version Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're working on a mobile-optimized version of the GLB Inspector. For now, please use a desktop computer to access all features.

expressions.title: Expression Testing
